200.description: Successful response with a paginated collection of media resources.

image.description: Image file to upload. Required. Must be an image.

name.description: Optional display name for the media.

200.description: Successful upload - returns the created media resource

parameters.description: ID of the media resource to delete
parameters.name: media

204.description: No Content — Successfully deleted the media resource; response has no body.

parameters.description: Search query to filter posts (full-text search).
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Number of comments per page (pagination limit).
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Successful response — a paginated collection of posts
Successful response - created post resource

parameters.description: ID of the post to fetch. For API (JSON) requests the Post model is route-bound by its numeric id.
parameters.name: post

200.description: Successful response - single Post resource

thumbnail_url.description: Nullable. Present when the post has a thumbnail; may be absent or null otherwise.

thumb_thumbnail_url.description: Nullable. Present when the post has a thumbnail; may be absent or null otherwise.

parameters.description: ID of the post to update
parameters.name: post

requestBody.description: Post object that needs to be updated

posted_at.description: Date/time when the post was posted

thumbnail_id.description: Optional ID of a thumbnail media (nullable)

200.description: Successful update - returns the updated post resource

parameters.description: ID of the post to delete
parameters.name: post

parameters.description: ID of the post to update
parameters.name: post

requestBody.description: Post object with fields to update (as validated by App\Http\Requests\Admin\PostsRequest). Only the listed properties are used by the controller.

thumbnail_id.description: ID of the thumbnail media (media.id); nullable

200.description: Successful update. Returns the updated post resource.

parameters.description: ID of the comment (route-model bound Comment identifier).

parameters.description: ID of the post
parameters.name: post

200.description: Comment created successfully

parameters.description: Identifier of the Post resource. For API (JSON) requests the Post model uses its numeric id (preferred for API clients); for non-JSON requests the model may use the post slug. Provide the post id for typical API usage.
parameters.name: post

200.description: Successful response. Returns the created Like resource when a new like is created; if the current user already liked the post, the controller returns null.

parameters.description: ID of the Post resource (route model binding; when request expects JSON the route key is 'id').
parameters.name: post

200.description: Successful response. Returns an array of Like objects that were deleted (may be empty).

parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve
parameters.name: user

200.description: Successful response containing the user resource wrapped in a top-level "data" object.

parameters.description: ID of the user to update (route-model-bound User).
parameters.name: user

requestBody.description: User object containing fields to update. 'name' and 'email' are required by request validation; 'password' is optional and will be hashed if provided.

name.description: User full name (validated by AlphaName rule).

password.description: Optional plaintext password; if present it will be hashed before storage.

200.description: Successful update - returns the updated user resource.

parameters.description: ID of the user resource to operate on (route parameter)
parameters.name: user

requestBody.description: Payload containing fields to update for the user. Only name, email and password are considered by the controller.

password.description: Plain-text password. If provided it will be hashed before storing.

200.description: Successful response. Returns the updated user resource.

parameters.description: ID of the user whose comments are being retrieved (resolved via Laravel route model binding).
parameters.name: user

parameters.description: Page number for pagination.
parameters.name: page
